snippet: The figures suggest that many more Afghan soldiers and police officers have been killed during the war than previously thought.
abstract: Afghan government statistics show that more than 13,000 Afghan soldiers and police officers have been killed during the war there, far more than previously known; most losses occurred during the three years that Afghan forces took over a growing share of the responsibility for security in the country.
lead_paragraph: The figures suggest that many more Afghan soldiers and police officers have been killed during the war than previously thought.

headline.main: War Deaths Top 13,000 in Afghan Security Forces
headline.print_headline: War Deaths Top 13,000 in Afghan Security Forces
